A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: A PC nightmare that continues to diminish the franchise.  This film is a complete PC joke if you are a real fan of Star Wars this will make you vomit.  The entire film seems to be written by middle school girls to promote \"girls can do anything boys can only better\".  The original Star Wars preached that to be a Jedi you need to control your emotions and not let hate rule your thoughts this one preaches the opposite.
